details.n: The Top 5 Reasons You Can't Blame...

ratings.en: Dennis Rodman for Being a Bad Boy
Grady Little for the Red Sox Losing the 2003 ALCS
Major League Baseball for keeping Pete Rose out of the Hall of Fame
The 1919 White Sox for 'Throwing' the World Series
Steve Bartman for the Cubs 2003 Playoff Collapse
The Edmonton Oilers for Trading Wayne Gretzky
Chris Webber for Michigan Losing to North Carolina in the 1993 NCAA Finals
Jerry Krause for the Demise of the Bulls
The Portland Trail Blazers for Drafting Sam Bowie Over Michael Jordan
Bob Knight for his repeated outbursts
